tree_branches.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! ===========================================
00002 !
00003 !           TREE_BRANCHES
00004 !
00005 !   Determine branch lists: 
00006 !     smallest set of twig nodes containing all local particles
00007 !     plus boundary particles if necessary.
00008 !   
00009 !
00010 ! ===========================================
00011 
00012 subroutine tree_branches
00013 
00014   use treevars
00015   use tree_utils
00016 
00017   implicit none
00018   include 'mpif.h'
00019 
00020 !  integer, parameter :: size_t=1000
00021   integer*8, dimension(nbranch_max) ::  resolve_key, search_key
00022   integer*8, dimension(8) :: sub_key   ! Child partial key
00023   integer, parameter :: nbranch_local_max=10000
00024   integer, dimension(max(5*nbranch_max/num_pe,nbranch_local_max)) ::  local_node, local_code, local_leaves  ! local branch data
00025 !  integer, dimension(nbranch_max) ::  local_node, local_code, local_leaves  ! local branch data
00026   integer, dimension(nbranch_max) :: newentry, branch_node, branch_code, branch_leaves  ! global htable data for branches
00027   integer :: treelevel
00028 
00029   integer*8 ::  keymin, keymax
00030   integer :: i, j, k, level, nsubset, ncheck, cchild, nchild, newsub, &
00031        link_addr, ncoll, nres, nbound, newleaf, newtwig, hashaddr
00032   integer :: nleaf_check, ntwig_check, nleaf_check2, ierr
00033   logical :: resolved
00034 
00035   ! Global arrays used:
00036   !   treekey
00037 
00038   integer :: key2addr        ! Mapping function to get hash table address from key
00039   integer :: startlevel = 2  ! Min permitted branch level
00040 
00041 !  branch_debug=.true.
00042   nleaf_me = nleaf       !  Retain leaves and twigs belonging to local PE
00043   ntwig_me = ntwig
00044   if (tree_debug) call check_table('after treebuild     ')
00045 
00046   if (tree_debug) write(ipefile,'(a)') 'TREE BRANCHES'
00047   if (me==0 .and. tree_debug) write(*,'(a)') 'LPEPC | BRANCHES'
00048 
00049 
00050   ! Determine minimum set of branch nodes making up local domain
00051 
00052   ncheck = 0
00053   nbranch = 0
00054   newsub = 0
00055   level = 1
00056   nsubset=0
00057 
00058   do i=1,nnodes
00059      treelevel  = log(1.*treekey(i))/log(8.)     ! node levels
00060 
00061      if (treelevel==1) then
00062         nsubset = nsubset+1  ! # nodes at level 1
00063         search_key(nsubset) = treekey(i)   ! Subset of nodes at same level
00064      endif
00065   end do
00066 
00067   do while ( ncheck < nleaf )
00068 
00069      call sort( search_key(1:nsubset) )  ! Sort keys
00070 
00071      if (nsubset > 0 ) then
00072         keymin = minval( search_key(1:nsubset),1 )      ! TODO:  This should include cells that have already been added to
00073         keymax = maxval( search_key(1:nsubset),1 )      ! to the list.  At present, keymin, keymax could lie in middle of 
00074         ! domain, causing 'gaps' in branch list
00075         ! =>  Compute from particle keys for given level instead.
00076 
00077         !        keymin = ishft( pekey(1),-3*(nlev-level) )      ! recover min, max twig keys from particle keys at this level
00078         !        keymax = ishft( pekey(nlist),-3*(nlev-level) )      ! recover min, max twig keys from particle keys at this level
00079 
00080         do i=1,nsubset
00081            treelevel  = log(1.*search_key(i))/log(8.)     ! node levels
00082            if ( (search_key(i) > keymin .and. search_key(i) < keymax .and. treelevel>=startlevel) .or. ( htable( key2addr( search_key(i),'BRANCHES: search' ) )%node > 0 )) then
00083               !  either middle node (complete twig),  or leaf:  so add to domain list
00084               nbranch = nbranch + 1
00085               pebranch(nbranch) = search_key(i)
00086               ncheck = ncheck +  htable( key2addr( search_key(i),'BRANCHES: ncheck' ) )%leaves  ! Augment checksum
00087 
00088            else 
00089               ! end node: check for complete twigs; otherwise subdivide
00090               cchild = htable( key2addr( search_key(i),'BRANCHES: cchild' ) )%childcode   !  Children byte-code
00091 
00092               nchild = SUM( (/ (ibits(cchild,j,1),j=0,7) /) ) ! # children = sum of bits in byte-code
00093               sub_key(1:nchild) = pack( bitarr, mask=(/ (btest(cchild,j),j=0,7) /) )  ! Extract sub key from byte code
00094 
00095               do j=1,nchild
00096                  resolve_key(newsub+j) = IOR( ishft( search_key(i),3 ), sub_key(j) ) ! Construct keys of children
00097               end do
00098               newsub = newsub + nchild
00099 
00100            endif
00101         end do
00102 
00103         if (branch_debug) then
00104            write (ipefile,'(/a,i7,a,i7/a/(i5,o16,i6,z5,i8))') 'Branches at level:',level, ' Checksum: ',ncheck, &
00105                 '    i      key         node     code     #leaves', &
00106                 (i,search_key(i), &
00107                 htable( key2addr( search_key(i),'BRANCHES: debug' ) )%node, &                         ! Node #
00108                 htable( key2addr( search_key(i),'BRANCHES: debug' ) )%childcode, &                         ! Children byte-code 
00109                 htable( key2addr( search_key(i),'BRANCHES:debug' ) )%leaves, &                           ! # leaves contained in branch 
00110                 i=1,nsubset)
00111         endif
00112 
00113      endif
00114      level = level + 1
00115      search_key(1:newsub) = resolve_key(1:newsub)        ! Put children into search list
00116      nsubset = newsub
00117      newsub = 0
00118   end do
00119 
00120   if (branch_debug) write (ipefile,'(/a/(i6,o16))') 'Domain branch list:',(i,pebranch(i),i=1,nbranch)
00121 
00122   ! Extract info about branches
00123 
00124   do i=1, nbranch
00125      local_node(i) = htable( key2addr( pebranch(i),'BRANCHES: info' ) )%node                       ! Node #
00126      local_code(i) =  htable( key2addr( pebranch(i),'BRANCHES: info' ) )%childcode               ! Children byte-code 
00127      local_leaves(i) = htable( key2addr( pebranch(i),'BRANCHES: info' ) )%leaves             ! # leaves contained in branch 
00128   end do
00129 
00130   if (ncheck > nleaf) then
00131      write(*,*) 'Checksum ',ncheck,' /= # leaves on PE ',me
00132   endif
00133 
00134   if (tree_debug) call check_table('after local branches')
00135 
00136   call MPI_BARRIER( MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)  ! Synchronize
00137 
00138 
00139 
00140 
00141   ! send copies of branch nodes to all other PEs
00142 
00143 
00144   ! first need to find number of branches to be gathered from each PE:
00145   ! do this by first collecting nbranch values on root.
00146 
00147   call mpi_allgather( nbranch, 1, MPI_INTEGER, nbranches, 1, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00148 
00149 
00150   ! work out stride lengths so that partial arrays placed sequentially in global array
00151 
00152   igap(1) = 0
00153   igap(2) = nbranches(1)
00154   do i=3,num_pe
00155         igap(i) = SUM(nbranches(1:i-1))
00156   end do
00157         
00158 ! igap(1:num_pe) = (/ 0, nbranches(1), ( SUM( nbranches(1:i-1) ),i=3,num_pe ) /)
00159 
00160   nbranch_sum = SUM( nbranches(1:num_pe) )   ! Total # branches in tree
00161   igap(num_pe+1) = nbranch_sum
00162 
00163 
00164   ! now collect partial arrays together on each PE
00165   ! using gather-to-all: nbranches and igap already defined locally
00166 
00167 !  nbuf = nbranch
00168 !  recv_counts = nbranches  ! receive buffer lengths and placement
00169 !  recv_strides = igap
00170 
00171   call mpi_allgatherv( pebranch, nbranch, MPI_INTEGER8, branch_key, &
00172                        nbranches, igap, MPI_INTEGER8, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00173 
00174   call mpi_allgatherv( local_node, nbranch, MPI_INTEGER, branch_node, &
00175                        nbranches, igap,  MPI_INTEGER, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00176 
00177   call mpi_allgatherv( local_code, nbranch, MPI_INTEGER, branch_code, &
00178                        nbranches, igap, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00179 
00180   call mpi_allgatherv( local_leaves, nbranch, MPI_INTEGER, branch_leaves, &
00181                        nbranches, igap, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00182 
00183   !  need to keep track of owners too
00184   do i=1,num_pe
00185      branch_owner(igap(i)+1:igap(i+1) ) = i-1
00186   end do
00187 
00188   if ( branch_debug .and. me == 0) then
00189      write (ipefile,'(/a/a/(2i5,o16,i12,z5,i10))') 'Global branch list:', &
00190           '   #       owner     key         node     code     #leaves', &
00191           (i,branch_owner(i), branch_key(i), branch_node(i), branch_code(i), branch_leaves(i),i=1,nbranch_sum)
00192 
00193   endif
00194 
00195   if (branch_debug) then
00196      nleaf_check = count(mask = branch_owner(1:nbranch_sum)/=me .and. branch_node(1:nbranch_sum) >0 )
00197      nleaf_check2 = count(mask = branch_owner(1:nbranch_sum)/=me .and. branch_leaves(1:nbranch_sum) ==1 )
00198      ntwig_check = count(mask = branch_owner(1:nbranch_sum)/=me .and. branch_node(1:nbranch_sum) <0 )
00199      write(ipefile,*) '# branch twigs to be added: ',ntwig_check,' node>0 ',nleaf_check,' branch_leaves:',nleaf_check2 
00200   endif
00201 
00202   ! Create entries in #table for remote branch nodes
00203 
00204   nres = 0
00205   do i = 1,nbranch_sum
00206 
00207      if (branch_owner(i) /= me) then
00208         call make_hashentry( branch_key(i), branch_node(i), branch_leaves(i), branch_code(i), branch_owner(i), hashaddr, ierr )
00209 
00210         nres = nres + 1            ! Count new entries
00211         newentry(nres) = hashaddr
00212      endif
00213   end do
00214 
00215 
00216   if (branch_debug ) write (ipefile,'(/a,4(/a20,i6))') 'Check on resolved nodes ','Total # branches: ',nbranch_sum, &
00217        'local:',nbranch,'new in #table:',nres
00218 
00219   newleaf = 0
00220   newtwig = 0
00221 
00222   ! Go through new nodes in table and label as leaf/twig
00223   do i = 1,nres
00224 
00225      if ( htable( newentry(i) )%leaves == 1 ) then
00226         ! leaf
00227         newleaf = newleaf + 1 
00228         htable( newentry(i) )%node = nleaf+newleaf    ! Create local label for remote branch
00229 
00230      else if ( htable( newentry(i) )%leaves > 1 ) then
00231         ! twig
00232         newtwig = newtwig + 1
00233         htable( newentry(i) )%node = -ntwig-newtwig    ! Create local label for remote branch
00234 
00235      else
00236         ! empty - problem with flagging
00237      endif
00238 
00239   end do
00240 
00241   if ( branch_debug) then
00242      write (ipefile,'(2(/a20,i6,a1,i6))') 'New twigs: ',newtwig,'/',ntwig+newtwig, 'New leaves:',newleaf,'/',nleaf+newleaf
00243      write (ipefile,*) 'Total # branches = ',nbranch_sum
00244   endif
00245   nleaf_me = nleaf       !  Retain leaves and twigs belonging to local PE
00246   ntwig_me = ntwig
00247   nleaf = nleaf + newleaf  ! Total # leaves/twigs in local #table
00248   ntwig = ntwig + newtwig
00249 
00250 
00251   call MPI_BARRIER( MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)  ! Synchronize
00252 
00253 
00254 
00255 end subroutine tree_branches
00256
